description: For the first couple of months it worked wonderfully. Then it started crashing sometimes randomly and sometimes when there's an image being uploaded. Unfortunately I haven't found an alternative yet.

While in many countries access to the internet may be ubiquious, reliable and cheap, there are places where this is not (always) the case. Lumi allows to create H5P content offline and make it available on the web later - but it also comes with some nice extra features that are pretty useful in certain scenarios, e.g. the HTML exporter that puts all the H5P content configuratio, media and logic into one static HTML file.
summary: Great addition to the H5P ecosystem

description: This HP5 software perfect for speed editing. Also support for SCORM export. Thank you very much for this usefull program.
summary: Speed form Web Interface and SCORM Export

description:
Eine tolle Anwendung, die die Gestaltung von H5P deutlich vereinfacht. Leider kann man mit Ihr nicht auf Wechseldatenträger zugreifen, da kein entsprechender Snap-Connector vorgesehen ist. :-(

A great app that simplifies the creation of H5P content considerably. Unfortionately it cannot access removable drives since there is no snap-connector for that provided. :-(
